Putin says Ukraine shot down plane, not clear if deliberately or in errorRussian President Vladimir Putin said a Russian military plane that crashed near the border with Ukraine on Wednesday was shot down by Ukrainian air defences, whether on purpose or by mistake. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 16:49:37 GMT CUTHK2EX7VI2FOSUJX3JGZ2IPA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-says-ukraine-shot-down-plane-not-clear-if-deliberate-or-mistake-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Palestinians see World Court ruling as both win and setbackPalestinians said the World Court let them down by failing to order a halt to the Israeli military offensive in Gaza, but they also described the proceedings as a victory which had inspired hope of accountability. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 16:43:12 GMT K2E67QFZ7RKTBGI3VFG4SO4ALM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinians-see-world-court-ruling-both-win-setback-2024-01-26/Ali Sawafta, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Emily Rose世界中东地区
Hungary making talks on EU aid for Ukraine 'more complicated' - senior EU officialEuropean Union (EU) talks on giving Ukraine 50 billion euros ($54 billion) in financial aid have been getting "more complicated" since Hungary has not been flexible ahead of next week's summit on the matter, a senior EU official said on Friday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 16:33:55 GMT 3OJKYZ5FT5PXPG2D67DKFBRMQM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-making-talks-eu-aid-ukraine-more-complicated-senior-eu-official-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Senior Hamas official: ICJ ruling helps to 'isolate' IsraelSenior Hamas official Sami Abu Zuhri said the International Court of Justice (ICJ) ruling on Friday was an important development that contributed to isolating Israel and exposing its crimes in Gaza. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 16:05:56 GMT D5LABILGKFKHZEONZK7NIXT46I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/senior-hamas-official-icj-ruling-helps-isolate-israel-2024-01-26/Reuters世界中东地区
Exclusive: Canada to re-start Turkey arms exports after Sweden NATO backing -sourcesCanada and Turkey have reached a deal to restart Canadian exports of drone parts in exchange for more transparency on where they are used, and it would take effect after Ankara completes its ratification of Sweden's NATO bid, two sources told Reuters. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 15:17:34 GMT FGVZIFJ3LZPZTOZ2X4RCWAKZLA https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-re-start-turkey-arms-exports-after-sweden-nato-backing-sources-2024-01-26/Jonathan Spicer世界
EU's centre-right expects to nominate von der Leyen for second term - EPP's CasparyThe European Union's main centre-right alliance will nominate Ursula von der Leyen for a second term as European Commission president at a congress in March if she wants to continue in the post, a senior EU lawmaker told Reuters. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:27:15 GMT 4O6IQ2VAL5I7LK2O3SFXOPQEMA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eus-centre-right-expects-to-nominate-von-der-leyen-second-term-epps-caspary-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia says it finds Ukraine IDs, tattooed body parts at plane crash siteRussia said on Friday it had recovered Ukrainian identity documents and tattooed body parts from the site where a Russian military plane that Moscow says was carrying Ukrainian prisoners of war crashed two days earlier near the Ukrainian border. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:24:45 GMT VZMII2AQHNJMBA2AWJ5NVR3E5 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-finds-ukraine-ids-tattooed-body-parts-plane-crash-site-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Mexico president says to present constitutional reform banning fentanyl consumptionMexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said Friday he will present a constitutional reform to ban consumption of chemical drugs such as fentanyl. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:16:10 GMT NLS63WRRAFL3XOIIKZEB7VNTZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-president-says-present-constitutional-reform-b​​anning-fentanyl-conspiration-2024-01-26/Reuters世界美洲
'Mandela will be smiling,' South Africa minister says on ICJ ruling against IsraelSouth Africa's liberation hero Nelson Mandela "will be smiling in his grave" at the World Court order imposing emergency measures against Israel over its war in Gaza, Justice Minister Ronald Lamola said. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:13:00 GMT H7VZDC3IZNJ7LFTZUQ6ZU4DVIM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/south-africa-hopes-israel-will-comply-with-world-court-order-minister-2024-01-26/Kopano Gumbi, Siyabonga Sishi世界非洲
Israel's Netanyahu: Charge of genocide 'outrageous'Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu welcomed a decision by the World Court on Friday not to order a ceasefire in the war in Gaza but rejected a charge of genocide as "outrageous", and said it would continue to defend itself. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 13:55:09 GMT D33Z4VJAFVOXTKGXS7IPRXOIFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-israel-comfilled-international-law-will-defend-itself-2024-01-26/Reuters世界中东地区
Catalan leader denies spy agency claim he led separatist protest groupCatalonia's regional leader on Friday denied allegations by Spain's spy agency CNI that he had secretly led a radical separatist protest group, which he said CNI had used as a pretext to snoop on him. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 13:49:39 GMT HYMJXOKW6JNVTKADBA2LYQR6SI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/catalan-leader-denies-spy-agency-claim-he-led-separatist-protest-group-2024-01-26/Joan Faus世界欧洲
